titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Everett Education Association Records

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections, University of Washington Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Mark Carlson via XSLT stylesheet conversion from Millennium MARC records. 2007
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

repository.corpname: University of Washington Libraries Special Collections

did.abstract: Records of the Everett Education Association

list.item: Accession No. 3849-001, Everett Education Association records, 1937-1947
Accession No. 3849-002, United Teachers of Everett records, circa 1971-1986
Accession No. 3849-003, Everett Education Association records, circa 1970-1972
Accession No. 3849-004, United Teachers of Everett records, 1986-1990
Accession No. 3849-005, Everett Education Association/United Teachers of Everett records, 1978-1992
Accession No. 3849-006, United Teachers of Everett records, 1975-1992

scopecontent.p: Bargaining files, budget files, cartoon, clippings, conferences and conventions, correspondence, dues files, historical features, logo design, membership files, memoranda of understanding, memos, minutes, newsletters, program materials, reports, resolutions, subject files, subject series, surveys.

userestrict.p: Rights governing reproduction and use vary. Contact Special Collections for more information.

scopecontent.p: Minutes of Everett Grade Teachers Club 1937-1947, and Everett High School Teachers' Association 1938-1943. These organizations were precursors to Everett Education Association.

userestrict.p: Creator's literary rights not transferred to the University of Washington Libraries.

did.unittitle: Minutes - Everett High School Teachers Assocation
Resignation from President Position Letter from J.S. Blue

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, minutes, bargaining files, subject files, newsletters, clippings, subject series.

userestrict.p: Creator's literary rights transferred to the University of Washington Libraries.

did.unittitle: National Education Association - Washington Education Association - Everett Education Association Memorandum of Agreement
did.abstract: Founding documentation with budget and objectives, outlining chain of command; Copied personal letter regarding memorandum

did.unittitle: Founding Documentation - United Teachers of Everett Labor Caucus
did.abstract: Outline of how the Everett Education Association will support the United Teachers of Everett Labor Caucus

Mostly photo-copies of letters sent, although some originals are included. Primarily letters to the Superintendent and Everett school board regarding improper or unfair hiring practices and letters to the WEA and NEA regarding delegations and invitations
Mostly original documents, includes the 1974-1975 Everett certified staff salary scales, discussion of the grievance process and correspondence with the Everett Federation of Teachers

Photo and carbon copies of records regarding contract negotiations on holidays, school schedules, and the leave policy; thank you letters to other education associations and to guest speakers at a retirement seminar that was held.

Carbon copies and some photo copies of information on affirmative action, financial information, EFT, class sizes, substitute teachers and staff evaluations,Everett Education Association revised by-laws
Photo and carbon copies regarding individual contracts, teacher surveys, membership enrollment, and business transactions, newspaper from WEA
Photocopies, and some originals of documents regarding levy agreements, contract bartering, strikes, EFT, and appointments
Letters, legal documents (restraining order) and memos, originals and copies, regarding tuition vouture legislation and Everett teachers strike
letters, job postings, memorandums regarding Iran, schedules and events, and organization elections
Letters regarding the Everett teachers strike, funding for the strike, talks with the EFT, and several directories (Everett Education Association, WEA) and agendas
Collection of bi-weekly newsletters focusing on national education issues, but highlighting local education organizations and issues
Primarily copies of letters sent by the Everett Education Association regarding contracts, strike / contract negotiation support, and drivers education / class schedule contracts
copies and original letters regarding membership, budgets, and letters of thanks, strike information, court case regarding strike costs

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Received Correspondence - Part 1
did.abstract: regional newsletters, organizational structures, court photos, nea v. Marshall memo, strike stoppage contract, strike costs,letters of support for the strike, letters against the strike

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Received Correspondence - Part 2
did.abstract: strike stoppage contract, strike costs, packet of strike support letters, letters against the strike, levy information, EFT letters
copies of job postings including qualifications, duties, and responsibilities for a variety of positions
copy of a speech, blank survey forms, sign up sheets, WA Senate proposed education budget, budget and tax commentary, copies of legislative bills
Snohomish County Employment and Training Admin. meeting minutes, various organizations newsletters, levy information and mandatory schooling
Collection of letters regarding teacher hiring, Everett Education Association meetings agendas, grievances, and order requests
vouchers, meeting agendas and minutes, letters and funding

did.unittitle: Superintendent of Public Instruction - Education costs
did.abstract: Tables of costs per school district and per country with explanations and percents and county treasury reports
Letters regarding collective bargaining and layoffs, extended leave information, substitutes, and a candidate endorsement list
Press releases, letters pertaining to layoffs, re-hiring of laid-off workers, payroll, and leave time
Letters regarding Everett Education Association / EFT combining documentation, women’s leadership, expense lists, membership recruitment, collective bargaining info
Letters regarding contracts, election endorsements, grievances, address changes, some discoloration stains on letters

did.unittitle: United Way of Snohomish County Information
did.abstract: Requests for money, budgets, and meeting minutes
Role of classified employees in WEA, bargaining, employment levels and types, grievances

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Correspondence - Part 1
did.abstract: Copies of letters regarding health insurance, legislative discussions, laws and budgets, staff transfers, Everett School District Goals and objectives list

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Correspondence - Part 2
did.abstract: Copies of letters regarding retirement, grievance hearings, Everett Education Association representative election process (by school), joint PTA – Everett Education Association meeting, contract edits, sick leave, and unemployment benefits and questionnai

Letters and documents, most original, regarding alcohol licenses, salary scale, employment and training administration information, surveys from league of Women voters re: education, special education, faculty assignments, and correspondence with legislat
Documents, laws, and actions by the Superintendent of Public Instruction regarding the state salary cap and the Everett School District levy

Requests for funding from the United Way of Snohomish County, PATCO support, Henry Jackson 1982 re-election campaign information, human resource information and policies, response letters from members of congress,
Budgets, conference registration forms, meeting minutes and agendas for a variety of organizations, founding documents of M-2 Job Therapy of Snohomish County,
Meeting agendas and minutes, labor film material / TV requests, Everett Housing Authority documents, new union charters

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Correspondence - Part 1
did.abstract: Mostly copies of letters inviting / reminding people of events, letters asking groups to drop reduction in force lawsuits, and letters to retiring teachers

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Correspondence - Part 2
did.abstract: Mostly copies of letters, some originals, regarding representatives (building and conference), dropping lawsuits, and contract negotiations

Court cases and legal documents regarding teacher hiring, 38th leg. District Democratic committee by laws, National labor union conference information (NEA, AFL-CIO), Bellevue bargaining survey to teachers, United Way funding requests
Letters from the Everett Education Association regarding in-school writing programs, collective bargaining, diversity programs, meeting minutes, and agendas
Collective bargaining, religious leave, coach's salaries, reduction in force, benefits packages, substitutes, role in the 1982 election
Letter to the editor, collective bargaining / negotiation training and tools, sick leave, meeting minutes, House Bill 21 legislative responses and opinions, role of educators in elections

Letters regarding early childhood education, meeting times and minutes, article on education as a political issue, sexual abuse treatment, employee census, education legislation summary, contract parts
Copies of leave requests to the Everett School District for employees for Everett Education Association related events
Welcome letters to new staff, pre-school year and start of school year contract negotiations information, and insurance information

Events calendar, Luther Child Center Sexual Abuse information, meeting minutes and agendas, letters regarding the legislative session, anti drinking and drugs campaign, United Way information, and Union Teacher Press Association roster
Pilchuck Uniserv meeting reminders and minutes, recruitment, bargaining, information on grievances, and budget information

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Letters - Part 1
did.abstract: Leave time, child labor and careers, Everett Education Association elections and positions, insurance information, coaches pay, teachers salary scale, and school levy information

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Letters - Part 2
did.abstract: News article on public perception of education, article on merit pay in education, bargaining process, responses to comments about the bargaining process, and school board candidate interview information
United Way funding requests, Washington State handicapped student report, labor book catalogue, NEA and biased curriculum, unbalanced taxes, and a report on sexually abused children
United Way meeting minutes and survey, organizational assessment, letters from Everett School District re: bargaining, court case information, labor / media handbook, WEA legislative handbook
Letters regarding collective bargaining, sick days, membership information, collective bargaining court case, tax allocations, grievances, coaches, and student writing

Uniserv representative application, political campaign information, Eastern Washington University survey on strikes, promotion process information, report on salaries and benefits, Everett subsidized housing information, and the role of labor in the era o
Meeting minutes, budgets, bargaining strategies, Monroe “Table Talk” newsletters, and benefits comparison report
Letters regarding meeting times, campaign endorsements, staffing information, insurance, and conference information

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Received letters and Information
did.abstract: Election thank you letters, medical benefits, and grant reference forms
Memos regarding meeting agendas, salary increases, budget reports, classified employees, probation, and structural changes through WEA and the National Labor Relations Board

Memos and letters regarding leave requests, conduct cases, National Education Association conference information and collective bargaining, survey of benefits, letters to the editor, and article on collective bargaining in higher education

Seatbelt law info, precinct voting chairs, various newsletters, annual state salary scale, Gramm-Rudman amendment, Christa McAuliffe lesson agenda from space, national elementary school recognition program and survey

Completed NEA grant application, memos regarding special programs concerns over collective bargaining, teacher mentor program, scheduling and Everett Education Association meetings, letter to the editor, weather make-up days, salary schedules, student mil

Lists of Everett Education Association building representatives, bargaining team, and officers, meeting minutes and agendas for Everett Education Association Executive Board and Representative Council meetings, Everett Education Association budget reports

Meeting minutes and agendas for Everett Education Association Executive Board and Representative Council, Everett Education Association budget reports and newsletters, teacher evaluation form for the Everett School District, letters regarding collective b
Budget reports, Executive board and representative council meeting agendas and minutes

Memos regarding international conflicts, math and science funding, Everett Chamber of Commerce, adult and special education funding, retirement funds, Expo ’86, and the 1985-1987 Washington State budget proposal

Memos from Superintendent of Public Instruction regarding teacher exchanges, migrant students, school certification, and interruptions in instructional time, letters of concern with idea of annual teacher contract
Washington Education Association Presidential election information, Pilchuck UniServ funding allocations, computer software for schools
Memos regarding meeting minutes, budgets, contract negotiation structure changes, and collective bargaining

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Memos Part 1
did.abstract: Copies of memos from Mike Sells, President Everett Education Association, regarding recruitment, retirement funds, insurance concerns, and retirement social invitations

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Memos Part 2
did.abstract: Copies of memos regarding Everett Education Association elections, insurance and benefits programs, other labor organizations, retirement funding, leave requests, and class size committee reports

Letters regarding teacher evaluations, information from other labor organizations, school accreditation applications, House Joint Resolution 22 - changes in levy voting laws, school board elections, cost of living report

Pilchuck UniServ budget report, legislative concerns, meeting announcements, information on House Joint Resolution 22, unified bargaining guidelines, list of education acronyms, grievances guide and issue

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Memos Part 1
did.abstract: Copies of sent memos regarding kindergarten teachers, Everett Education Association representatives, class sizes, other labor organizations, candidate endorsements, list of new members

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Sent Memos Part 2
did.abstract: Copies of sent memos regarding starting teacher salaries, new Everett Education Association members, future of Everett Education Association Labor Caucus, school board candidate interview questions, congressional concerns and contacts

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Organizational Documents Part 1
did.abstract: Budget reports, Executive board and representative council meeting agendas and minutes, newsletters, and bi-laws

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Organizational Documents Part 2
did.abstract: Budget reports, Executive board and representative council meeting agendas and minutes, newsletters, and bi-laws

List of board members, building representatives, members, press releases, Everett Education Association election materials, descriptions of Everett Education Association responsibilities, salary scale, collective bargaining recommendations, political acti
Confrontation description, ballot, Everett Education Association contact list, interview information, public opinion phone survey outline

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Executive Board Records
did.abstract: Executive board agendas, minutes, goals and objectives, and memos regarding meeting times

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Representative Council Records
did.abstract: Representative council agendas, minutes, memos regarding meetings (time and place)
Monthly and annual budget reports and school calendar

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association All School Publications
did.abstract: Various newsletters, Everett Education Association election information, event announcements, and levy information
Documents regarding how to write a grievance complaint, committee guidelines, handbook for grievance representatives, meeting reminders, and case studies
Everett Education Association membership lists, dues information, and a list of membership categories

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Representative Council Records
did.abstract: List of representatives and goals, copies of agendas, record of meeting minutes, and Everett Education Association election information

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Executive Board Records
did.abstract: List of board members, meeting calendar, agendas and meeting minutes, school board election information, statement of educational philosophy rough draft
Budget reports and preliminary budgets

Collection of newsletters and letters posted for all teachers, Shortwaves weekly newsletter, salary scale, Uniserve News, information on school board elections, political action committee, Staff Report, and school board briefings
Documents regarding bi-law revision process and changes

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association / Everett Federation of Teachers Unification
did.abstract: Collection of letters, newsletters, ballots, and proposals to unify the Everett Education Association and Everett Federation of Teachers, creating United Teachers of Everett (UTE)
Contract analysis and development information and calendar, legal referral information summary of contract issues
Everett Education Association bi-laws, precinct caucus information, “Political Educator” “UniServ News” and “Your Public Schools” newsletters, year-end committee reports

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Executive Board Records
did.abstract: Meeting agendas and minutes

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Representative Council Records
did.abstract: Calendar of events, agendas, meeting minutes, letters and memos sent to the Representative Council
Documents, newsletters, and memos published and available to all teachers including salary scale, election information, and conferences
United Teachers of Everett founding documents, committee reports, election procedures, contract information, annual goals
Membership records, names of members by school, teachers by school and union / non-union affiliation, recruitment letters and strategies, Everett Education Association handbook

did.abstract: Letters and endorsements regarding political campaigns

Documents, newsletters, and memos published and available to all teachers including salary scale, election information, and conferences
Contract amendments, committee reports, press releases, and Everett Education Association Educational Philosophy

Copies of proposed Washington state legislation governing issues brought before the Public Employment Relations Commission (Washington Administrative Code 391-08), collective bargaining in Education (WAC 391-30), and a summary of these laws.
Copies of contract negotiation points from the Everett School District to the teachers
Edmonds Education Association salary survey, copies of Everett salary survey and instructional memo “to determine degree of support” (on original file folder)
Copies of the Everett School Board’s contract proposal for teachers with memo from Everett Education Association President Chuck Olson
History of negotiations, report on negotiations, lists of items to negotiate in fall 1969 and spring 1970

did.unittitle: Original Everett Education Association Contract Proposal
did.abstract: Copy of Everett Education Association contract proposal with carbon copy of memo regarding content
Different versions of the contract, with hand-written corrections on them as negotiations progressed
Copy of district calendar and teachers salaries / hiring practices

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association 1st Draft of Contract Proposal
did.abstract: First draft of Everett Education Association contract with comments on each portion of the existing contract

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Contract Negotiations and Impasse Reports
did.abstract: Letters to school board and explanation for lack of agreement, carbon copies and typed copies of documents, one hand-written letter
Salary schedules for administrators, school nurses, and teachers for 1970 to 1972
Calendars by dates and months outlining what needs to be done in the contract negotiations process
Collection of surveys sent out to teachers regarding salaries and other factors for contract negotiations
Reports from Professional Rights and Responsibilities committee, Improvement of Instruction Committee, and salary committee with recommendations for negotiations, two copies of each
Copies of different salary schedules and memos regarding them

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Original Contract Proposal
did.abstract: Formal contract proposal presented to the Everett School Board by the Everett Education Association with contract sections allowing for collective bargaining
Copy of and memos regarding the handbook for teachers outlining general policies, teaching rights, and contract information
All Documents and information regarding contract negotiations, many hand written pieces and carbon copies with lots of blotches and fading ink
Copies and memos regarding new salaries and ground rules for negotiations
Contract for Everett teachers to sign for 1971 – 1972 school year

did.unittitle: Everett Teacher's Handbook and Tentative Contract Agreement
did.abstract: Tentative contract agreement for 1973-1974 school year and teacher’s handbook for 1972-1973 school year

did.unittitle: Power of Attorney for Contract Negotiation
did.abstract: sample documentation giving Everett Education Association power to negotiate contracts for teachers
Original contract given to Everett Education Association for the contract of the 1972-1973 school year with school calendar
Copies of salary scale, explanation of salary changes, some fading carbon copies of memos
School calendars and note regarding their importance / significance
Analysis of negotiations process, typed and hand-written documents
Documents explaining need for salary increase and how it affects teachers with benefits in comparison to other school districts
Handwritten survey results regarding teachers priorities for contract negotiations
Material planning for reduction in funding, staff lay-offs, etc. in the event that levies do not pass, includes legal documents and hand-written analysis
copy of Everett Education Association contract proposal with memo explanation
Handwritten notes describing the negotiation process and providing a transcript of the discussions
Bound handbook with contract information and teachers rights and responsibilities
Faded carbon copies and tables of salary schedules and description of benefits
Proposals from school board regarding staff reduction and evaluation methods
Hand-written suggestions by teachers to the Everett Education Association as requested for collective bargaining

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Contract Counter Proposals
did.abstract: Counter proposals to district contract as negotiations go on, focus on maternity leave, grievances, and curriculum development
Two copies of the tentative contract agreement for 1973-1974 school year
Documents from Superintendent of Public Instruction allowing for principals to form their own unions
Copy of the Everett Education Association contract proposal from spring 1974
Copy of the Everett school board minutes from March 31 1975 regarding salaries
Copies of surveys regarding teacher priorities in the contract process
Negotiations between school board and Everett Education Association as a result of funding cuts

Handwritten notes transcribing the reduction of force discussions, ranging from December 19, 1973 to April 24, 1974. The first three sessions are on removed notebook paper, and sessions 4 to 21 are in a spiral bound notebook.

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association and Everett School District Tentative Agreements
did.abstract: Tentative agreements between the Everett Education Association and Everett school district regarding evaluations and contracts, three copies of each document

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association v. Everett School District
did.abstract: Copy of court ruling between the Everett Education Association and Everett school district regarding the district’s refusal to negotiate contracts

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Contracts and Handbook
did.abstract: Everett Education Association tentative contract agreement, copy of the teacher’s handbook, Everett Education Association proposed contract, master copy of the contract, and representative council notes

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Contract Negotiations Plan
did.abstract: Lists of representatives and contact people, as well as a collection of copies of petitions urging the Everett School District to meet with the Everett Education Association for contract negotiations
Copies (printed and carbon) of certain job positions, their contracts, and legal mandates.
Copies and handwritten notes regarding contract negotiations, tentative contracts, and ground rules for contract negotiations
Copies of tentative and master contracts for the 1975-1977 school years, including coaches salaries and job expectations
Copy of lists of all teachers with their birthdates, certifications and year of graduation
Discussions about contract timeliness, handwritten and photo-copied notes about contract negotiations and rules of procedure, survey and survey results
Bargaining meeting minutes and agendas with notes and annotations, Everett Education Association specific contract proposals and district counter-proposals
Binder with detailed contract proposals, responses, and calendar agreements
Information from the bargaining election process, includes surveys, election rules, election results, and analysis
Press releases, financial reports, newsletters, etc. regarding the bargaining election
Financial reports, newsletters, local bargaining agreements, other district agreements, descriptions of proposals
Counter proposals, definitions of terms in contracts, annotated versions of material in folder 9 with additional notes and memos
Drafts and annotations of contract proposal parts by sections that correspond to folder 8/9, some rough pages, mostly copies with handwritten notes
Drafts and annotations of contract proposal parts by sections that correspond to folder 8/9, some rough pages, mostly copies with handwritten notes
Drafts and annotations of contract proposal parts by sections that correspond to folder 8/9, some rough pages, mostly copies with handwritten notes
¼ filled stenograph notebook regarding crisis bargaining process, copied pages of the faculty handbook, proposed full master contract from spring 1976, held together with metal screws
Copies of memos regarding contracts and contract riders, certified employee contracts, copies of hand-written notes and counter-proposals

did.unittitle: Negotiation Session Minutes and Notes Part 1
did.abstract: Spiral notebook with hand-written notes from negotiation sessions, also with typed minutes for most meetings based off of notes

did.unittitle: Negotiation Session Minutes and Notes Part 2
did.abstract: Spiral notebook with hand-written notes from negotiation sessions and carbon copies of minutes in back of notebook

did.unittitle: Negotiation Session Minutes and Notes Part 3
did.abstract: Legal pad with hand-written notes from negotiation sessions 30 to 33

did.unittitle: Negotiation Session Minutes and Notes Part 4
did.abstract: Spiral notebook half filled with notes from meetings between the district and Everett Education Association

did.unittitle: Negotiation Session Minutes and Notes Part 5
did.abstract: Spiral notebook with notes from findings and research for contract negotiations
Teachers’ contract agreement while a new contract is discussed

Copies of proposals and counter proposals presented by the school district on a variety of subjects, collected by the Everett Education Association – with hand-written notes and some paperclip rust damage.
Evidence for Everett Education Association v. ESD court case in favor of the Everett School District regarding teachers’ salaries and experience in Washington.

Last proposals from ESD and Everett Education Association before court trial, collection and definition of issues that the ESD has failed to address, denied, or which the Everett Education Association has not addressed
Court documents regarding the fact-finding process for the Everett Education Association and ESD outlining the issues and positions of each party
Binder put together by the Everett Education Association outlining each issue and the information on each issue that they have
Proposed Collective Bargaining Agreement, nondiscrimination act, individual rights, notes from negotiation sessions, and Everett Education Association master contract
Annotated copy of district and Everett Education Association positions on contract issues, issues that led to a strike
School District proposals to end the Everett Education Association strike, October 1976, three copies of two proposals
Everett Education Association strike-ending proposals from October 1976 and the back to work agreement between the Everett Education Association and ESD
Strike newsletters, hand-written notes about the strike, and two copies of the ESD teachers’ contract
District proposals and negotiations, hand-written and copied positions, mostly in good condition, some torn corners

did.unittitle: Everett Education Association Bargaining and Negotiations

scopecontent.p: Historical feature, memoranda of understanding; 1983-1992. File documents the history of the levy-salary issue. Addition 5/98 of letter dated 12/17/1975 and clipping dated 9/9/1978, also on topic of levy.

userestrict.p: Literary rights of representatives of the records-creating organization transferred to the University of Washington Libraries.

did.unittitle: History of the Levy-Salary Issue materials (Memorandums, Package proposals and counterproposals, Correspondence)
